channel.title: COD5 World at war
channel.description: Trailer was released today on PSN EU so i imagine other placecs must have got it discuss it i thought it looked promising and should definately shape up to be a good game

item.title: COD5 World at war
item.dc:creator: @sanga282 sanga282
item.description:
@sanga282 wrote:

[quote=“chrisn2323, post:5, topic:215541”][quote author=Thug-life link=topic=283295.msg2299065#msg2299065 date=1214527145]

I’m not sure of the attitude everyone on PSN Has towards it but from the people I’ve spoken with on CoD4 / BF:BC And Halo they all seem to think it will be terrible,

Thats because they are all ignorant faggots who obviously hate it just because its not based in modern times, i think it’ll definatly be better due to a better Ai and more realisitic extra effects, i said this on the other topic too but i always thought CoD3 > CoD4 and since this one is being developed by the same people as CoD3 i’ll probably get this.
[/quote]
cod3 sucked. 2 and 4 were way better.[/quote]
Thats an opinion personally i liked COD4 and didn’t mind the rest before them i was an MOH fan

Read full topic

item.title: COD5 World at war
item.dc:creator: @eVokki1 Cowie`
item.description:
@eVokki1 wrote:

I’m not sure of the attitude everyone on PSN Has towards it but from the people I’ve spoken with on CoD4 / BF:BC And Halo they all seem to think it will be terrible, I’ve seen the trailer and think it looks pretty good myself, especially with the ability to climb trees and use flamethrowers.

I’m going to get it, and my friends are going to als - It’s a definate buy for me.

Read full topic
